message: outkss now uses its own version of calc_vkb

Allocate arrays with psps%lnmax  use indlmn to loop

Activate inclvkb 2 in v67mbpt[40] (GW with psp8 pseudos)
Now DFPT+non-collinear work with non-polarized systems without Vxc (FR  MT  EB)
DFPT+noncoll now OK for non magnetic cases

Added the eph_routine  to compute all the gkk elements on a k-point grid for a given q-point grid. Added two variables to control the tasks when optdriver==7:     prtphdos     eph_task I still need to document those.
Update abinit to TRIQS/CTHYB interface for version 1.3 of TRIQS and CTHYB
Update doc concerning TRIQS/CTHYB (input variable: dmft_solv)
fix the error message in the general case  and restricts it to dmft calculations

An error was introduced in getgh1c  corrected
Adjustements to make automatic tests happy - take 1
Added documentation to 3 new variables:     eph_task     ddb_shiftq     prtphdos
Adjustements to make automatic tests happy - take 2 (update ref due to change of tolerance in rhohxc)
Merge branch 'develop' of abinit-gitlab:trunk/abinit into dfpt-noncoll

The non-collinear DFPT now works with full Vxc1 and rho1 compared with magnetic collinear systems
